sm.$description: Label font size for small fields (12px).

md.$description: Label font size for medium fields (14px).

lg.$description: Label font size for large fields (14px).

small.$description: Toast font size for small size (14px)

large.$description: Toast font size for large size (16px)

sm.$description: Gap between label and control for small fields (6px).

md.$description: Gap between label and control for medium fields (8px).

lg.$description: Gap between label and control for large fields (10px).

helper.$description: Gap between control and helper text (4px).

message.$description: Gap between control and error message (4px).

internal.$description: Gap between compound field parts (input+select, etc.) (4px).

selector.$description: Gap between flag, code, and chevron in selector (8px).

picker.$description: Gap between inputs and expand button (8px).

small.$description: Toast icon size for small size (20x20px)

large.$description: Toast icon size for large size (24x24px)

sm.$description: Label line height for small fields (1.5).

md.$description: Label line height for medium fields (1.5).

lg.$description: Label line height for large fields (1.5).

small.$description: Toast line height for small size

large.$description: Toast line height for large size

sm.$description: Selector horizontal padding for small fields (10px).

md.$description: Selector horizontal padding for medium fields (12px).

lg.$description: Selector horizontal padding for large fields (14px).

sm.$description: Picker horizontal padding for small fields (10px).

md.$description: Picker horizontal padding for medium fields (12px).

lg.$description: Picker horizontal padding for large fields (14px).

sm.$description: Chip small padding-inline-start when icon/avatar present (4px)

md.$description: Chip medium padding-inline-start when icon/avatar present (8px)

lg.$description: Chip large padding-inline-start when icon/avatar present (12px)

sm.$description: Right padding for select component small (accounts for chevron icon: padding-x + chevron-size + gap = 12px + 20px + 4px = 36px).

md.$description: Right padding for select component medium (accounts for chevron icon: padding-x + chevron-size + gap = 16px + 20px + 4px = 40px).

lg.$description: Right padding for select component large (accounts for chevron icon: padding-x + chevron-size + gap = 20px + 20px + 4px = 44px).

sm.$description: Base vertical padding for small fields. Use with calc() and optical alignment offset for padding-top and padding-bottom adjustments.

md.$description: Base vertical padding for medium fields. Use with calc() and optical alignment offset for padding-top and padding-bottom adjustments.

lg.$description: Base vertical padding for large fields. Use with calc() and optical alignment offset for padding-top and padding-bottom adjustments.

sm.$description: Base top padding for small fields. Use with calc() to subtract optical offset: calc(var(--token-component-padding-top-field-sm) - var(--token-semantic-typography-optical-alignment-offset-sm))

md.$description: Base top padding for medium fields. Use with calc() to subtract optical offset: calc(var(--token-component-padding-top-field-md) - var(--token-semantic-typography-optical-alignment-offset-md))

lg.$description: Base top padding for large fields. Use with calc() to subtract optical offset: calc(var(--token-component-padding-top-field-lg) - var(--token-semantic-typography-optical-alignment-offset-lg))

sm.$description: Base bottom padding for small fields. Use with calc() to add optical offset: calc(var(--token-component-padding-bottom-field-sm) + var(--token-semantic-typography-optical-alignment-offset-sm))

md.$description: Base bottom padding for medium fields. Use with calc() to add optical offset: calc(var(--token-component-padding-bottom-field-md) + var(--token-semantic-typography-optical-alignment-offset-md))

lg.$description: Base bottom padding for large fields. Use with calc() to add optical offset: calc(var(--token-component-padding-bottom-field-lg) + var(--token-semantic-typography-optical-alignment-offset-lg))

icon.$description: Optical padding adjustment when icon is present. Reduces padding on the side where icon is displayed for better visual balance.

sm.$description: Padding adjustment when leading adornment is present for small fields. This replaces the left padding to accommodate the adornment.

md.$description: Padding adjustment when leading adornment is present for medium fields. This replaces the left padding to accommodate the adornment.

lg.$description: Padding adjustment when leading adornment is present for large fields. This replaces the left padding to accommodate the adornment.

sm.$description: Padding adjustment when trailing adornment is present for small fields. This replaces the right padding to accommodate the adornment.

md.$description: Padding adjustment when trailing adornment is present for medium fields. This replaces the right padding to accommodate the adornment.

lg.$description: Padding adjustment when trailing adornment is present for large fields. This replaces the right padding to accommodate the adornment.

hover.$description: Subtle hover using brand-700 (accent color) with 5% opacity - applied via CSS color-mix or rgba for better color matching on colored backgrounds

pressed.$description: Subtle pressed using brand-700 (accent color) with 8% opacity - applied via CSS color-mix or rgba

hover.$description: Subtle hover using brand-700 (accent color) with 5% opacity - applied via CSS color-mix or rgba for better color matching on colored backgrounds
Subtle hover using grey-700 with 5% opacity - applied via CSS color-mix or rgba for better color matching on colored backgrounds

pressed.$description: Subtle pressed using grey-700 with 8% opacity - applied via CSS color-mix or rgba

hover.$description: Subtle hover using grey-700 with 5% opacity - applied via CSS color-mix or rgba for better color matching on colored backgrounds

pressed.$description: Subtle pressed using grey-700 with 8% opacity - applied via CSS color-mix or rgba

color.$description: Focus ring color for buttons. Uses semantic focus border token.

offset.$description: Focus ring offset from button edge (4px).

dissabled.$description: Alias for disabled to support Figma variable path (dissabled).

default.$description: Delete icon hover background for default chips (rgba with 8% opacity)

colored.$description: Delete icon hover background for colored chips (rgba with 20% opacity)

default.$description: Delete icon active background for default chips (rgba with 12% opacity)

colored.$description: Delete icon active background for colored chips (rgba with 30% opacity)

default.$description: Label text color in default state.

error.$description: Label text color in error state (red).

margin.$description: Margin after label text before required asterisk (2px).

width.$description: Separator line width between compound field parts (1px).

background.$description: Country code selector background color (light gray).

sm.$description: Minimum width for country code selector small (50px).

md.$description: Minimum width for country code selector medium (60px).

lg.$description: Minimum width for country code selector large (70px).

sm.$description: Minimum width for select in InputGroup small (100px).

md.$description: Minimum width for select in InputGroup medium (120px).

lg.$description: Minimum width for select in InputGroup large (140px).

offset.$description: Focus ring offset from field edge (2px).

blur.$description: Focus ring blur radius for soft glow effect (8px).

opacity.$description: Focus ring opacity for soft glow effect (30%).

content.$description: Line height for select text content and tags (24px)

height.$description: Height of tags in select component (24px)

maxWidth.$description: Maximum width for tag text before truncation (200px)

chevron.$description: Gap between tags wrapper and expand/collapse icon (16px)

sm.$description: Gap between clear icon and expand/collapse icon for small size (8px)

md.$description: Gap between clear icon and expand/collapse icon for medium size (12px)

lg.$description: Gap between clear icon and expand/collapse icon for large size (12px)

hover.$description: Opacity for hover and active states (0.8)

maxHeight.$description: Maximum height for dropdown (6 options  40px + 8px padding = 248px)

offset.$description: Vertical offset between select trigger and dropdown (4px)
